nodes.text: Pa'hir'al City was a city located within the Pa'hir'al system.

In 1 BBY, the Rebel operative Tirranna was captured by the Galactic Empire in Pa'hir'al City. She was subsequently tortured and interrogated by High Inquisitor Mox Slosin. Although Tirrana survived the interrogation, she would keep physical and psychological scars for the rest of her life, as well as an important hatred towards Slosin.
